text: Five Days from Home is a 1979 American crime drama movie directed by George Peppard (who also stars) and starring Sherry Boucher, Neville Brand, Robert Donner, Ronnie Claire Edwards, Savannah Smith Boucher. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Five Days from Home
